name: WildWaters
summary:
WildWaters is an unreleased game for the Nintendo 64. 
 
In development at Looking Glass in 1999, this kayak title was only shown behind closed doors at that year’s E3 expo. When the developer closed shop, the title disappeared. The following info was used in the announcement of the title: 
 
The water-based arcade racer will offer six different characters to choose from as well as three different kayak types, each with their own respective strengths and weaknesses. Wildwater will send up to two players down six perilous river courses, highlighted by realistic water physics and eye-popping graphics. Ubi Soft is promising five different gameplay modes, including Arcade, Time Trial, Championship, Finals and Versus Battle.
